name: Endless Generation
description:
Project made for Game Jam IGAD Y1 Block B. 

(started a week late so didn't get as much done as we wanted to + no Visual Artists)

Controls:

  • Use WASD to navigate
  • Press Space to activate a shield
  • Scroll Mouse Wheel to switch weapons
  • Press Left Mouse Button to shoot

Made by:

  • Dennis Butijn (Designer)
  • Ruben Brinkman (Programmer)
  • Jip Crombag (Designer)
